subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han compound|辵|alt1=辶|t1=motion|尺|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|no_och2=1}}.

{{Han simp|遲|f=犀|t=尺}} in the 1956 {{w|Chinese Character Simplification Scheme}} by the People's Republic of China.<!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/漢字簡化方案 --> This character is not known to have existed prior to that.
